channel.title: Why you hate/love Justin Bieber? Put your reasons here
channel.description:
Hi guys, I just wanna ask you guys why you hate/love Justin Bieber. Most of you, according to hate him, but there must be a reason for that. Post it here.
My Reason: I hate him because he dated Selena Gomez, and I'm jealous of that :/ :P
Post your reasons below.
Thanks :D

item.title: Why you hate/love Justin Bieber? Put your reasons here
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:34, topic:394828”][quote author=`SJ_ link=topic=492010.msg3599036#msg3599036 date=1305396901]
He’s an over confident cock-bag, I’d shove his head up his ass, just so he can see his shit clearly.

Edit:

"1. He hasn’t hit a thing called “puberty”.
3.He looks like a girl.
6.His voice is immature.

so… he’s young?

Last I recall, he’s 17, older than the majority of this forum. My balls dropped when I was 11.
[/quote]
I don’t understand why you’d hate someone because they seem younger than they are, though.[/quote]
Cause he’s a gigantic dick.

Like, I respect him as a music artist, as I respect every artist. Not as a person though.

Read full topic
item.source: Why you hate/love Justin Bieber? Put your reasons here

item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

I don’t like him because he is egotistical, has had everything handed to him while good artists are fighting to provide for themselves, he isn’t talented, he sings about love and other things when he has no idea what the hell love is, his fans are ridiculous, he does that stupid whipping his bangs thing, he is immature, a huge douche in interviews, and overall the fact that he is so popular and it has been declared the next Michael Jackson when he is complete and utter shit…

Read full topic

item.title: Why you hate/love Justin Bieber? Put your reasons here
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:18, topic:394828”]At first I hated him because everyone loved him, he was over hyped.

Then he was on Conan and Lopez tonight. This kid is a fucking douchebag, hes wayy too over confident and overall just acts like a dick. A girl from the cast of CSI said he was a brat to everyone on set except for her. I hate him so much even more, yet my sister is just “YOU’RE JUST JEALOUS SHUT UP”[/quote]
If this is true, then I dislike him even more.

This girl is obviously brainwashed with his little gimmicks to try and get people to like him and believe he is a good person:
“Reasons To Love Justin Bieber:
1.) He grew up below the poverty line, so he deserves some money.
2.) He’s a sweet guy! (:
3.) He hit puberty, so his voice sounds waayyy betterr than it used to.(:
4.) He’s willing to do anything for his fans.
5.) He suffers enough harrassment from these stupid haters.
6.) He helps with charities and stuff. He deserves to be loved.
7.) He has an ahhmazing voice.
8.) He’s a great person.
9.) he loves his haters!
10.) he doesn’t care what people say about him.
11.) he does what he thinks is right; not what other people tell him to do.
12.) he is a Christian :]
13.) he lives for God.
14.) he loves me (his fan)
15.) he sings from his heart, not for the money.
16.) he’s very special
17.) he’s awesome
18.) Bieber’s got swag
19.) he’s very open minded
20.) he doesn’t judge people, like haters do.”

Read full topic
